Detailed Description

Simple filter that only clears changes up to a certain accumulated payload size.

It refreshes after a given time in MS, in a staggered way (e.g. if it clears 500kb at t=0 and 800 kb at t=10, it will refresh 500kb at t = 0 + period, and then fully refresh at t = 10 + period).
